Text: Now we are trying to extent this to N100 million which will happen before the end of this year, so if you want N100 million, you will be able to get a buy back, if you want 20,000, you will be able to get a buy back.
Cause: Now we are trying to extent this to N100 million which will happen before the end of this year
Effect: if you want N100 million, you will be able to get a buy back, if you want 20,000, you will be able to get a buy back.
Sentence: <e1>Now we are trying to extent this to N100 million which will happen before the end of this year</e1>, so <e2>if you want N100 million, you will be able to get a buy back, if you want 20,000, you will be able to get a buy back.</e2>
